{{- range $key,$val := .Site.Params.pathShortcuts -}} {{- $key = print "PATH_" (upper $key) -}} {{- $.Scratch.Set $key $val -}} {{- $.Store.Set $key $val -}} {{- end -}} {{- /* Halde: Scratch versus Store: https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/scratch-sometimes-has-empty-data-in-development-mode/38603/2 $.Page.Scratch.Set "_PATH_" .Site.Params.pathShortcuts $.Page.Scratch.SetInMap "pathShortcuts" "PATH_PARTIAL" "site/layouts/partials" */ -}}
